LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class

ITEM.TEXT: Add a specific category to the list of possible category

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA wa LIKE LINE OF my_keys. FIELD-SYMBOLS <wa> LIKE LINE OF my_keys.
IF category IN r_system_categories. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>system_category category = category. ENDIF. IF do_exists( category ) IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>category_do_not_exists category = category. ENDIF.
IF data_type IS INITIAL. wa-ok = abap_true. ELSE. wa-ok = is_data_type_ok( data_type ). IF wa-ok = abap_false. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>category_do_not_exists data_type = data_type. ENDIF. ENDIF.
READ TABLE my_keys WITH TABLE KEY cat = category ASSIGNING <wa>. IF sy-subrc = 0. <wa>-ok = wa-ok. IF <wa>-ok = abap_true. <wa>-type = data_type. ENDIF. ELSE. " unexpected but handled wa-cat = category. IF wa-ok = abap_true. wa-type = data_type. ENDIF. INSERT wa INTO TABLE my_keys. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0. ENDIF.

` DATA _cat LIKE LINE OF r_system_categories.
_cat-sign = 'I'. _cat-option = 'CP'. _cat-low = '_*'. APPEND _cat TO r_system_categories. " System Range
SELECT category INTO TABLE all_keys FROM ygplmt_category.
system_keys = all_keys. DELETE system_keys WHERE key NOT IN r_system_categories.
` READ TABLE all_keys WITH TABLE KEY key = key TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS. IF sy-subrc = 0. exists = abap_true. ENDIF.

ITEM.TEXT: Controle que le type de donnée est OK

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA _data TYPE REF TO data.
TRY. CREATE DATA _data TYPE (data_type). result = abap_true. CATCH cx_sy_create_data_error. result = abap_false. ENDTRY.

ITEM.TEXT: Is the category a system category ?

ITEM.SOURCE:
` FIELD-SYMBOLS <wa> LIKE LINE OF system_keys.
IF NOT category IN r_system_categories. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>not_system_category category = category. ENDIF. IF do_exists( category ) IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>category_do_not_exists category = category. ENDIF.
READ TABLE system_keys TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH TABLE KEY key = category. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>not_system_category category = category. ENDIF. result = abap_true.

ITEM.TEXT: Is the category a valid user category ?

ITEM.SOURCE:
` FIELD-SYMBOLS <wa> LIKE LINE OF my_keys.
IF category IN r_system_categories. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>system_category category = category. ENDIF. IF do_exists( category ) IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>category_do_not_exists category = category. ENDIF.
READ TABLE my_keys WITH TABLE KEY cat = category ASSIGNING <wa>. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>category_not_define category = category. ENDIF. IF <wa>-ok = abap_false. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_category EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_category=>category_not_define category = category. ENDIF. result = abap_true.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_category, cat TYPE td_category, ok TYPE td_boolean, type TYPE td_data_type, END OF ts_category `
BEGIN OF ts_key, key TYPE td_category, END OF ts_key `
tt_categories TYPE SORTED TABLE OF ts_category WITH UNIQUE KEY cat `
tt_keys TYPE HASHED TABLE OF ts_key WITH UNIQUE KEY KEY `
